# WKUserNotificationInterfaceType.custom

**Case**

A constant indicating that the system should display your dynamic notification interface.

## Declaration

```swift
case custom
```

## Constants

- **WKUserNotificationInterfaceType.default**: A constant indicating that the system should display the corresponding static interface instead. When you return this value, the system takes responsibility for displaying the notification’s content.

items.description: A constant indicating that the system should display the corresponding static interface instead. When you return this value, the system takes responsibility for displaying the notification’s content.
